replies.replyComment: He is NOT honest as you think. One can speak nicely and attract people. In one of his videos he criticised MR and I wrote a comment to defend MR. The comment was removed.I didn't use any bad or harsh words in my comment.  This is what timid people do to protect themselves . He could have replied my comment instead.

comments.comment: If you lived out of Sri Lanka for few years then you will no the TRUE value of bringing Gota to power. It's SAD to see in Sri Lanka there are so many EXTERNAL FORCES pumping MONEY to DIVIDE and DESTROY SRI LANKA. Sri Lanka has suffered enough for test trials. At the moment Sri Lanka needs a proven leader who has shown he has the ability to handle the worldly tasks, plots, traps set by rest of the world to make Sri Lanka push back to slavery. The leader must have proven track record of completing a job well done. Well seasoned to handle the problems of Sri lanka. It could be true that there will be good independent candidates for the president. However, RIGHT NOW it's not the TIME for an INDEPENDENT candidate. New names, new independent candidates,  majority of the population never heard of coming to power as President is very SCARY!!!  It must be a candidate you can probe for good or bad, who has shown the work in the past and as people of Sri Lanka....we are able to talk, probe good or bad about them. However, if there is a candidate with NO history or NO record, by chance if they come to power, then we have to wait for 4-5 years to find out their MISTAKES, or to find out the BAD side of them. Sri Lanka can not afford to test trial another candidate good or bad.  Kiyamana: Dhanna Yaka Hodai, Nodhanne Devadutaya to Wada.  I see that as a person living in the WEST, this is a plan of the WEST promoting independent candidates at this time is to UPSET and DESTROY the proper PATRIOTIC candidate winning the election (GOTABAYA). Look at MODI, Indian Leader: country did not allow the West to divide INDIA into pieces to get who the WEST wants. Modi is a proven, patriotic, tested, experience leader who has great forceful personality: I can only think of Gotabaya. Also consider countries like Singapore. Hope Sri Lanka will NOT fall into the same TRAP like last time in the presidential election. All Sri Lanka has to UNITE to save the country from these evil plans to destroy the country. The answer is not to TEST TRIAL new candidates, but to select a PROVEN leader who can get the country out of the mess. May be in the future the Independent Candidates can serve the country to show their worth for FUTURE elections: NOT this CRUCIAL election.
comments.author: wlog101

replies.replyComment: I respect you choice my brother or sister. However, you have to choose from the candidates presented. Unfortunately, your basis for rejecting Gotabaya for his assumed crimes has no validity. If what you are making is a statement, then that it self is not fair to reject a candidate (solely based on your statement). If it is the case in Sri Lanka that the guilty is not punished, then the same principal applies to Nagananda. He also can be assumed as a criminal. I am only talking about facts. Because, last election people did not choose based on QUALIFICATIONS. Just like a job interview, you have to find the one that is suitable for the job based on the needs of Sri Lanka. I have lived 20 years in Sri Lanka, and 20 in the West. So, the thinking process I learned from the West. That is why my personal choice is Gotabaya, who understand how US thinks. In order to deal with world powers you need to begin to think like one. In that aspect apart from many other qualifications, Gotabaya take the first place so far from among the candidates presented. Sri Lanka can not afford another mistake. Sri Lanka needs someone who has a proven track record that he is able to do a job well done. Qualification must match with the experience to lead any nation based on the burning issues of the county. That is why it is important to look at Sri Lanka from a global point of view to move Sri Lanka forward.

wlog101 you live in or out of srilanka you can‚Äôt have a president charged with huge crimes
